description: I am a bilingual (French and English) full-stack developer based in Montreal, holding a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science from Concordia University. With a deep passion for technology, I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to expand my knowledge. I thrive on learning and applying innovative solutions to complex problems, and I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in the tech industry

As a Full-Stack Cloud Developer in the Financial Markets division of a top Canadian bank, I processed large financial datasets using AWS Glue and automated tasks with AWS Lambda. I built real-time APIs with Spring WebFlux, created React dashboards used by 100+ analysts, and managed CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub. Additionally, I optimized data storage and querying with PostgreSQL to ensure scalability and performance.

As a Full-Stack Developer on the API Team at a top Quebec financial institution, I developed event-driven microservices on Azure using Java 17, Spring Boot 3, and Spring Cloud. I integrated services with RabbitMQ, MQ-Series, and Azure Service Bus, and used Azure SQL Database and Redis for data storage and caching. I built Angular 16 applications, set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub and Concourse, and maintained Swagger API documentation. Additionally, I applied design patterns like BFF, API gateways, and CQRS.
